channel.title: CVE Feed for AAM -- Advanced Access Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AAM -- Advanced Access Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-29127|2024-08-02T01:03:51.877Z -- aam -- advanced%20access%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AAM Advanced Access Manager allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Advanced Access Manager: from n/a through 6.9.20.

item.title: CVE-2024-29124|2024-08-02T01:03:51.872Z -- aam -- advanced%20access%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AAM Advanced Access Manager allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Advanced Access Manager: from n/a through 6.9.20.
